item.title: Ground Hog’s Day 2020
item.dc:creator: Evans Whitaker
item.description:
(a rebus) Dear UCSF Library colleagues, And no. The answer to the rebus is not ISH Tire Plant (a well-known international supplier of industrial short-haul tires). I plan to retire from the library on 02/02/2020. Ground Hog’s Day 2020 seems a good day numerically and is one of those “big ...

item.title: UCSF Library Road Trip to UCM and UCSF Fresno
item.dc:creator: Evans Whitaker
item.description:
Chris Shaffer and Evans Whitaker took to the highway to visit UC Merced and UCSF Fresno this week. UC Merced seems an unlikely campus; it appears over the horizon as a number of giant cranes hovering over a campus under construction. The Kollogian Library (http://library.ucmerced.edu/) was the first building on campus. It is ...

Read moreUCSF Library Road Trip to UCM and UCSF Fresno

item.title: Sugar Science Website Launched
item.dc:creator: Evans Whitaker
item.description:
After waiting for the sugar tax ballot initiatives in Berkeley and San Francisco to be voted upon November 4, 2014, the SugarScience.org launched on November 10, 2014. The project has been dormant for more than six months waiting for Election Day. Why? Federal law prohibits tax-exempt entities like public universities ...

Read moreSugar Science Website Launched

item.dc:creator: Evans Whitaker
item.description:
Thanks to the combined efforts of Liz, Sean, Michele, with admirable back up from Gail and Julia and contributions from all parts of the library … you will begin to see testimonials from various satisfied library patrons commenting on various services, persons, or places they appreciate about the library . ...

item.title: Increased Visibility of Library Guides
item.dc:creator: Evans Whitaker
item.description:
A Featured Guide and one-click access to See All Guides now resides in the right lower corner of the library home page. Library guides are hand-selected collections of the best journals, databases, websites and more about a topic. These collections are created and updated by UCSF librarians and/or subject experts. ...

Read moreIncreased Visibility of Library Guides

item.description:
